text: Tapirus tarijensis is an extinct species of tapir that lived during the Pleistocene epoch. Fossils of the species have been found in the Tarija Formation of Bolivia.Tarija at Fossilworks.org == References == †Tapirus tarijensis Category:Pleistocene mammals of South America Category:Ensenadan Category:Pleistocene Bolivia Category:Fossils of Bolivia
title: Tapirus tarijensis
